This set is a really cool set. It involves, well... ah who cares? It'
column2: s too awesome for words! Let&#39
column3: s just do a quick review of the Minifigures, and then we can do pros and cons.

column1: Kai is one of the best ninja, in my opinion. In this set (just like the Kai Fighter), he is in his Rebooted Techno-suit, and has his Techno-blade. Plus he drives this heck of a machine!
This Nindroid is thinking with a damaged brain. I mean, what is he thinking?! Flying, while the X-1 Ninja Charger can shoot him with the Spring-loaded Shooter! Not very smart, yet perfect. He'
column2: s weakening his chances of getting shot by going into small spaces, where only the X-1 Ninja Charger&#39
column3: s hidden eject motorcycle can fit. Very clever Nindroid. Very clever. Anyway, he comes as a standard Nindroid, along with the glider, of course.

column1: Again, not very smart. This is wider than the glider, and it can'
column2: t fit in small spaces. Looks like an easy target, if you ask me. Anyway, he comes as a standard Nindroid, along with his glider and blade.

column1: The Recon Nindroid is the small thing at the bottom right of the picture. I believe it is used as a hunter, to spot the ninja. He isn'
column2: t much, but he is pretty cool.

column1: And now, for the pros and cons.
• more models for others (Zane, Lloyd, Jay, Cole, Sensei Garmadon, Nya)?
Honestly, I think this set is pretty cool. It was soooooooo worth the money!
